questions.question: What should you do when approaching a yellow traffic light?
options: Speed up to make it through
Stop if it is safe to do so
questions.explanation: A yellow light means the signal is about to turn red. You should stop if you can do so safely. Only proceed if you are too close to stop safely.

questions.question: What is the proper following distance behind another vehicle?
questions.explanation: The three to four second rule gives you enough time to react if the vehicle ahead stops suddenly. Increase this distance in bad weather or at higher speeds.
